hotspots.label: Harvestman Arachnid
hotspots.fact: This photograph features an arachnid, specifically a harvestman (Opiliones), resting on the deeply textured bark of a tree.

hotspots.label: Eight Legs
hotspots.fact: Its eight exceptionally long, thin legs radiate outward, breaking up its silhouette against the irregular shadows and ridges of the tree surface.

hotspots.label: Lichen Growth
hotspots.fact: The specimen displays remarkable crypsis (camouflage), with its body coloration and leg banding mirroring the mottled greys, browns, and whites of the lichen-covered bark.

hotspots.label: Camouflaged Body
hotspots.fact: The body is positioned centrally, exhibiting a compact cephalothorax and abdomen that blend seamlessly into a dark crevice in the bark.
